summary: AT 70,000 MILES MY CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WENT ON. I IMMEDIATELY TOOK IT TO MY MECHANIC WHO SAID IT'S THE TIMING CHAIN. HE NOW HAS MY CAR COMPLETELY TORN APART SO HE CAN FIX THE OUTRAGEOUSLY EXPENSIVE ISSUE.

BOTH FRONT TURNING INDICATORS ARE BROKEN. THE RIGHT TURNING INDICATOR WAS FIXED BY MY HUSBAND AND QUIT WORKING 2 DAYS AFTER HE GOT IT WORKING. A FEW DAYS LATER THE LEFT TURNING INDICATOR STOPPED WORKING.
CAR SHUTTERS AND BUCKS AT SPEEDS AROUND 39-55 , NO CHECK ENGINE LIGHT AND I TRIED MULTIPLE TIMES TO CONTACT CADILLAC WITH NO HELP AT ALL ! THE DEALER I DEALT WITH CLOSED ABRUPTLY WITHOUT NOTICE !

MY TIMING CHAIN FAILED AT 70,000ML, THERE IS A SB-10043857-3386  BULLETIN NO:11340B :DATE:JULY 2012 THAT SHOULD COVER MY VEHICLE FOR FREE TIMING CHAIN REPLACEMENT. GM DOES NOT WANT TO HONOR THE REPAIR EVEN THOUGH THEY HAVE ISSUED THIS SB. PLEASE HELP. MY VEHICLE IS MANUFACTURED IN 2009 IN MEXICO (DATE ON DOOR TAG) AND IT SHOULD BE PART OF THIS RECALL.  PLEASE HELP.
WHILE MOVING,  ON A CITY STREET,SMOKE CAME FROM THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT AND THE BRAKES NO LONGER FUNCTIONED.
LOSS OF POWER STEERING WHILE DRIVING. HARD TURNING.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. WHILE DRIVING 55 MPH, A LOUD NOISE WAS HEARD FROM THE STEERING WHEEL. THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME STIFF AND REQUIRED EXCESSIVE FORCE IN ORDER TO MANEUVER THE VEHICLE. THE FAILURE OCCURRED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT CALLED THE DEALER AND WAS INFORMED THAT SHE WOULD NEED TO PAY FOR THE REPAIR. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT IT WAS THE CONTACT'S RESPONSIBILITY TO PAY FOR THE REPAIR AND PROVIDED CASE NUMBER: 8-909379197. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30,000.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT 60 MPH, THE REDUCE ENGINE SPEED WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND THE VEHICLE DECELERATED INDEPENDENTLY. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED BUT THE VEHICLE FAILED TO RESPOND. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER TO BE DIAGNOSED. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL SENSOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, HOWEVER THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 46,762.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SEAT BELT WAS FRACTURED. THE FAILURE OCCURRED WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE DRIVER SUSTAINED MULTIPLE  MINOR LACERATIONS ON THE LEFT FOREARM DUE TO THE FAILURE, BUT MEDICAL ATTENTION WAS NOT REQUIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 53,000.

CAR JERKS AND SHUDDERS HEAVILY WHEN ACCELERATING AT 2000 RPM OR BETWEEN 40 AND 60 MPH. CHANGED TO NEW DRIVE SHAFT, TRANSMISSION REBUILT BUT NOTHING WORKS. IT IS A SERIOUS SAFETY CONCERN. IT HAPPENS AT HIGHWAYS.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. WHILE DRIVING AT 30 MPH, THE "REDUCE ENGINE SPEED" WARNING MESSAGE ILLUMINATED WHICH CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO DECELERATE TO 5 MPH ON THE HIGHWAY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 130,073.
REDUCE ENGINE SPEED KEEP POPPING UP AND WILL NOT LET YOU DRIVE OVER 10MILES PER HR

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED, THE SERVICE AIR BAG INDICATOR CONSISTENTLY ILLUMINATED. THE FAILURE RECURRED EACH TIME THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY RECALLS. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 98,000.

THE CAR SERGE'S ALL THE TIME, THE MOTOR SOUNDS LIKE A DIESEL WHEN YOU START IT FOR ABOUT 10 SECONDS THEN GOES AWAY. HAD THE OIL CHANGED AND DID EVERYTHING I AND THE MECHANICS COULD DO AND IT IS STILL THERE. THE KEY KEEPS GETTING STUCK AND HARD TO START. THIS CADILLAC SRX ONLY HAS 82K MILES AND THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON  FOR OVER 25K MILES. GUESS I JUST NEVER NEED TO BY A CADILLAC AGAIN.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX. WHILE SHIFTING INTO REVERSE, THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED FORWARD, CRASHED INTO A STORE, AND STRUCK ONE PERSON. THE PERSON STRUCK BY THE VEHICLE SUSTAINED BROKEN RIBS THAT REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 73,000.

AT 9:00 PM ET ON 20-NOV-2012 I WAS DRIVING 20 MINUTES TO MY HOME FROM MY IN-LAWS AT ~30 MPH IN MONROE, OHIO WHEN MY AIRBAGS MALFUNCTIONED.  THE CAR WAS TOWED TO CAMARGO CADILLAC'S BODY SHOP FOR REPAIRS THE MORNING OF 21-NOV-2012.  BOTH A SPECIALIST FROM STATE FARM (MY INSURANCE) AND THE INSPECTOR HIRED BY GM DECLARED THAT THE AIRBAGS MALFUNCTIONED.  GM?S REPRESENTATIVE INSPECTED THE VEHICLE ON 03-DEC-2012 AND THE REPORT WAS RECEIVED AT GM ON 12-DEC-2012.  IT WAS NOT UNTIL 19-DEC-2012 THAT GM  APPROVED PAYING FOR THE REPAIRS. GM WOULD NOT STATE WHAT ERROR OCCURRED THAT CAUSED THE AIRBAGS TO MALFUNCTION. MY CAR WAS UNDER WARRANTY UNTIL 100,000 MILES AND HAD ~ 76,000 MILES ON IT AT THE TIME OF THE ACCIDENT. IT TOOK ~2 MONTHS FOR THE REPAIRS TOTAL.      NO APOLOGIES WERE MADE BY GM FOR STRESS OR FOR PUTTING MY LIFE AT RISK.  I AM THANKFUL NO ONE ELSE WAS AFFECTED BY THE ACCIDENT, AS I WAS DRIVING ALONE AND DID NOT LOSE CONTROL OF MY VEHICLE.  REPRESENTATIVES FROM GM AND CAMARGO STATED THEY ARE UNAWARE OF PREVIOUS AIRBAG MALFUNCTIONS IN GM VEHICLES.  BELOW ARE LINKS TO 2 ARTICLES WHICH REPORT ABOUT GM AIRBAGS MALFUNCTIONING.     HTTP://WWW.9WSYR.COM/CONTENT/NEWS/REAL_DEAL/STORY/GM-SETTLES-WITH-COUPLE-AFTER-RANDOM-AIRBAG/AKKU26VGHUOLXIW-3PJZZG.CSPX      HTTP://EXTREME.MOBILE.MSN.COM/AUTOS/BLOG/GM-OWNERS-STARTLED-BY-SUDDEN-AIRBAG-DEPLOYMENT-WHILE-DRIVING/250030472    THANK YOU AGAIN FOR TAKING TIME TO REVIEW MY CONCERNS ON THE SAFETY OF GM VEHICLES.   *TR

WAS DRIVING TO WORK.REDUCED VEHICLE POWER LIGHT CAME GO.CONTINUED TO DRIVE VEHICLE.PARKED CAR AT WORK.CAME OUT TO GO HOME. LIGHT WAS OFF.HALF WAY HOME LIGHT CAME ON AGAIN.MADE IT HOME.WAS GOING TO TAKE CAR TO DEALER BUT LIGHT NEVER CAME ON AGAIN.OTHER DAY WAS ON WAY TO WORK LIGHT CAME ON AGAIN,AN STAYED ON.TOOK CAR TO DEALER,HE SAID IT WAS SENSOR AT GAS PEDAL.HAD TO REPLACE WHOLE ASSY. AND WIRE HARNESS.COST 1042.00.CAR IS ONLY 5 YEARS OLD.  *TR

THE CHAIN IN THE TRANSFER CASE OF MY VEHICLE BECAME LOOSE.   AT FIRST THE CHAIN WAS SKIPPING ON THE SPROCKETS ONLY WHEN I LET THE CAR ROLL AND THEN ACCELERATE, IT GAVE A JUMP UNTIL IT GOT TIGHT AGAIN, BUT AFTER FEW HUNDRED MILES OF DRIVING LIKE THIS IT STARTED TO SKIP WHENEVER I TRY ACCELERATE AND IT'S UNDER LOAD FOR EXAMPLE ON A RAMP TO A FREEWAY OR UPHILL, THIS BECOMES REALLY SCARY TO DRIVE. I'M AFRAID THAT ONE DAY IT WILL START TO ROLL BACKWARDS UPHILL WHILE TRYING TO ACCELERATE.    THIS ISSUE IS DISCUSSED ONLINE ON FORUMS IN LENGTH BY THE CADILLAC COMMUNITY AND EVERYBODY IS WONDERING HOW CADILLAC HAS AVOIDED THIS FROM GETTING A RECALL SINCE IT SUCH A COMMON PROBLEM!    HERE ARE SOME LINKS FOR PROOF HOW COMMON THIS PROBLEM IS.  HTTP://WWW.CADILLACFORUMS.COM/FORUMS/CADILLAC-SRX-FIRST-GENERATION-FORUM-2004/212418-DIY-TRANSFERCASE-CHAIN-REPLACEMENT.HTML    HTTP://WWW.CARPROBLEMZOO.COM/CADILLAC/SRX/TRANSFER-CASE-PROBLEMS.PHP    HTTPS://WWW.BING.COM/SEARCH?SETMKT=EN-US&Q=CADILLAC+SRX+TRANSFER+CASE+CHAIN.  *TR

THE CHROME OVERLAY ON THE INSIDE DOOR HANDLE SEPARATED FROM THE BASE METAL OF THE DOOR HANDLE EXPOSING A SHARP EDGE ON THE INNER SIDE OF THE DOOR HANDLE, WHICH CANNOT BE READILY VISIBLE UNTIL YOU PULL ON THE HANDLE WHEN TRYING TO OPEN THE DOOR FROM THE INSIDE. THE CHROME OVERLAY PEELED UP SLIGHTLY EXPOSING A SHARP EDGE OF THE CHROME THAT COULD CUT THE HAND. THE PART IS NOT A VERY EXPENSIVE PART, AND THE INCIDENT IS NOT A MAJOR INCIDENT, BUT THE SEPARATED CHROME OVERLAY COULD CAUSE SLICING OF THE HAND OR FINGER WHEN TRYING TO OPEN THE DOOR. IT SEEMS TO BE A QUALITY ISSUE.  *TR

I AM WRITING REGARDING THE CADILLAC SRX VIN # [XXX] I PURCHASED IN 07/09 FROM MASSEY CADILLAC.  WE HAVE A SERIOUS PROBLEM WITH THIS VEHICLE AND THE NUMBER OF TIMES IT HAS BEEN IN THE CADILLAC REPAIR SHOP SINCE IT WAS PURCHASED.  THE MOST EGREGIOUS DEFECT IS THE PASSENGER AIRBAG.  THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN IN THE REPAIR SHOP A TOTAL OF NINE TIMES FOR THE SAME ISSUE.  THE PASSENGER AIRBAG DOES NOT ACTIVATE WHEN A PASSENGER IS SEATED IN THE PASSENGER SEAT.  THERE IS A SAFETY CONCERN & AND A POTENTIAL NEGLIGENCE CLAIM FOR CADILLAC BECAUSE IF A FATAL ACCIDENT WERE TO OCCUR AND THE AIRBAG FAILED TO DEPLOY AND THE PASSENGER WAS EITHER INJURED OR THERE WAS A FATALITY, CADILLAC HAS BEEN ON NOTICE FOR MONTHS THAT THERE WAS AN ISSUE WITH THIS VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE GOES INTO THE SHOP, STAYS FOR A FEW DAYS, IS RETURNED TO ME AND THE SAME ISSUE HAPPENS AGAIN -- A PASSENGER IS SEATED IN THE PASSENGER SEAT AND THE AIRBAG SENSOR DOES NOT REGISTER THAT A PERSON IS SEATED THERE.  NOTE:  AS OF 4/29/13 THE VEHICLE IS SITTING IN THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT OF MASSEY CADILLAC ORLANDO WAITING TO BE REPAIRED.      INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6). *TR

PASSENGER AIR BAG DOES NOT COME ON WITH PASSENGER IN SEAT: 9/23/2010 SAME;10/11/2010 SAME10/102011 SAME SUPPRESSION MODULE REPLACED;6/202012 PASSENGER AIR BAG LIGHT IS IN THE OFF POSITION 3/12/2013 PASSENGER AIR BAG IS IN THE OFF POSITION SUPPRESSION MODULE REPLACED 4/3/2013 PASSENGER AIR BAG IS IN THE OFF POSITION SUPPRESSION MODULE REPLACED 4/19 /2013 AIR BAG LIGHT IS IN THE OFF POSITION.  *TR

I WAS DRIVING MY 2009 CADILLAC SRX.  ANOTHER VEHICLE RAN A STOP SIGN AND STRUCK ME ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE. THE POINT OF IMPACT WAS ON THE LEFT FRONT WHEEL AND THE LEFT FRONT DOOR.  THE SIDE AIRBAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY INSPITE OF EXTENSIVE DAMAGE TO THE VEHICLE.  THE FRAME WAS BENT, THE DOOR WOULD NOT OPEN AND THE CAR WAS NOT DRIVABLE.   THE REPAIR COSTS ARE ESTIMATED @7500.  *TR

HAVE HAD MY SRX INTO THE DEALER TWICE FOR THE SAME REASON THAT UPON ACCELERATION OF VEHICLE LOOSES POWER AND HESITATES DUE THE   STABILITY TRACTION SYSTEM . IT WILL HESITATE AND THEN KICK IN. THIS IS VERY BAD WHEN TRYING TO TAKE OFF FROM A  STOP AND INTO TRAFFIC AND THE CAR JUST LOOSES THE ABILITY TO ACCELERATE. THE ENGINE IS GONG BUT YOUR NOT AND THEN IT WILL FINALLY KICK IN. THE DEALER REPLACED A SENSOR THE LAST TIME BUT THIS TIME SAID THAT THEY HAD THE CODE BUT WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE IT WHEN DRIVING IT. SO THEY RESET IT AND ERASED THE CODE BUT UNSURE IF THAT WILL WORK. THEY CLAIM THAT THEY HAVE NEVER HEARD OF IT BUT UPON RESEARCHING THIS ON THE INTERNET HAVE FOUND SEVERAL PEOPLE HAVE HAD THE SAME ISSUES HAPPEN TO THEM TOO. *TR

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX WITH GOODYEAR EAGLE RSA 235/65/17 255/60/17 ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT TIRES.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT ON THE INSIDE OF ALL FOUR TIRES THE BELTS WERE SEPARATED.  GOOD YEAR WAS NOTIFIED AND STATED THEY WOULD GIVE HIM 30% OFF OF THE LIST PRICE.  THE TIRES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH A DIFFERENT BRAND OF TIRES. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 37,000.

ON 2 SEPARATE OCCASIONS WITH 2 DIFFERENT DRIVERS THIS REAR WHEEL DRIVE VEHICLE WITH "A" TRACTION RATED TIRES LOST CONTROL AND THE BACK END SPUN AROUND 90 DEGREES.  THIS VEHICLE HANDLED EXTREMELY POORLY ON WET ROADS AND THE MANUFACTURER COULD FIND NO DEFECTIVE SYSTEMS.  TRACTION CONTROL/STABILITRAC WAS ACTIVE AND WORKING. *TR  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED ANY AFFIRMATION RELATED TO THE CADILLAC SRX REAR WHEEL DRIVE AND STABILITY ON WET PAVEMENT OR POOR ROAD CONDITIONS. THE CONSUMER TRADED THE VEHICLE  IN WITHIN 2 MONTHS OF OWNERSHIP.  UPDATED 01/21/10.*JB
HEAD REST IS TOO FAR FORWARD FOR MY HEAD COMFORT.  IT CAUSES PHYSICAL PAIN WITHIN 5-10MINUTES OF DRIVING THE VEHICLE. *TR

TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 CADILLAC SRX.  THE OWNER'S MANUAL FOR THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE STATED THAT IF THERE WAS A SENSOR IN THE PATH OF THE SUNROOF, IT WILL RETRACT WHEN OPENING.  THE SUNROOF IN HER VEHICLE DOES NOT RETRACT.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE SUNROOF WAS WORKING PROPERLY AND DOES NOT NEED REPAIR.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 9,000.
